description: meta info used by the CPMD parser, all names are expected to start with x_cpmd_

metaInfos.description: CPMD run start time and date
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_start_datetime

metaInfos.description: Contains information about the starting conditions for this run
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_start_information

metaInfos.description: CPMD input file name.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_input_filename

metaInfos.description: The process id for this calculation.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_process_id

metaInfos.description: The user who launched this calculation.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_run_user_name

metaInfos.description: The host on which this calculation was made on.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_run_host_name

metaInfos.description: Contains information about the run type.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_run_type_information

metaInfos.description: Contains information about the exchange-correlation functional.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_xc_information

metaInfos.description: Contains information about the system.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_system_information

metaInfos.description: Contains information about the pseudopotentials.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_pseudopotential_information

metaInfos.description: Contains information about the atomic kinds present in the calculation.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_atom_kinds

metaInfos.description: Contains information about one atomic kind.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_atom_kind

metaInfos.description: The label of the atomic kind.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_atom_kind_label

metaInfos.description: The mass of the atomic kind.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_atom_kind_mass

metaInfos.description: The width of the ionic charge distribution (RAGGIO) of the atomic kind.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_atom_kind_raggio

metaInfos.description: The nonlinear core correction (NLCC) of the atomic kind.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_atom_kind_nlcc

metaInfos.description: The angular part of the pseudopotential for the atomic kind.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_atom_kind_pseudopotential_l

metaInfos.description: The type of the pseudopotential for the atomic kind.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_atom_kind_pseudopotential_type

metaInfos.description: Contains information about the supercell.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_supercell

metaInfos.description: The symmetry of the cell.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_cell_symmetry

metaInfos.description: The cell lattice constant.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_cell_lattice_constant

metaInfos.description: The cell volume.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_cell_volume

metaInfos.description: The cell dimension.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_cell_dimension

metaInfos.description: Lattice vector A1
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_lattice_vector_A1

metaInfos.description: Lattice vector A2
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_lattice_vector_A2

metaInfos.description: Lattice vector A3
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_lattice_vector_A3

metaInfos.description: Reciprocal lattice vector B1
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_reciprocal_lattice_vector_B1

metaInfos.description: Reciprocal lattice vector B2
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_reciprocal_lattice_vector_B2

metaInfos.description: Reciprocal lattice vector B3
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_reciprocal_lattice_vector_B3

metaInfos.description: Number of points in the real space mesh.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_real_space_mesh

metaInfos.description: Place wave cutoff energy for wave function.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_wave_function_cutoff

metaInfos.description: Place wave cutoff energy for density.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_density_cutoff

metaInfos.description: Number of plane waves for density cutoff.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_number_of_planewaves_density

metaInfos.description: Number of plane waves for wave_function cutoff.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_number_of_planewaves_wave_function

metaInfos.description: Contains information about the wave function initialization
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_wave_function_initialization

metaInfos.description: Contains information about self-consistent field calculation
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_scf

metaInfos.description: Contains information about the self-consistent field iteration.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: The scf step number.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_scf_nfi

metaInfos.description: GEMAX during SCF step.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_scf_gemax

metaInfos.description: CNORM during SCF step.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_scf_cnorm

metaInfos.description: The total energy (ETOT) during SCF step.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_scf_etot

metaInfos.description: The difference in total energy to the previous SCF energy (DETOT).
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_scf_detot

metaInfos.description: The CPU time used during SCF step (TCPU).
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_scf_tcpu

metaInfos.description: The final results after a single point calculation.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_final_results

metaInfos.description: Contains information about the timings.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_timing

metaInfos.description: Contains information printed at the end of a calculation.
metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_end_information
